/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided by a median, stretches out into the distance, flanked by lush green trees and shrubs on both sides. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the expansive view. A few light vehicles can be seen traversing the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static landscape. The colors in the image are predominantly green and blue, with the greenery providing a refreshing contrast to the blue sky. The overall composition of the image paints a vivid picture of a day in the life of this vibrant city.
